My name is tony and I live in Sydney, Australia My Father is a Literature professor at a university and my mother is an interior designer, Where do Tony and his family live?
Tony mother is a/an?

The Bonds live in London Mr. and Mrs. Bond Have two sons The first son’s name is Michael He is the oldest. The second son’s name is Kevin. He is the youngest. The Bonds live in a house. The house is spacious and has a garden, Where do the Bond family live?
How many son/s do Mr. and Mrs. Bond have?
Who is the youngest?
Who is the oldest?

I just came back from one of the best vacation ever had! I had so much fun. This summer, I went to Istanbul, Turkey. My best friends, Liam and Joseph, were with ne. We stayed in a hotel on the European side and it was a reasonable price. What city did the friends go to?
When did they go to Istanbul?

, I just came back from one of the best vacation ever had! I had so much fun. This summer, I went to Istanbul, Turkey. My best friends, Liam and Joseph, were with ne. We stayed in a hotel on the European side and it was a reasonable price. What city did the friends go to?
Where was the hotel?
After Paul woke up, he made the bed, brushed his teeth and had a shower. What did Paul do before shower?

The Loggerhead Sea Turtle is named for its large head and blunt jaw. This huge sea turtle can grow to 800 pounds (though the average turtle is about 200 pounds) and three and a half feet in length. Why is this species name Loggerhead Sea Turtle?
choices: It rest his head on logs
